recipe.title: Jammie Dodger French Toast Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Add the eggs, cream, icing sugar and vanilla extract to a bowl and whisk until smooth.
Dip two slices of bread into the mix, soaking them thoroughly.
Fry both slices until golden brown on both sides.
Cut paper heart out of baking paper.
Place paper heart on one slice of bread and cut a heart shaped hole into the bread using the paper as a guide.
Spread jam on the other slice of bread, then place the bread with the heart on top of this slice.
Place the paper heart back over the hole, and sprinkle with icing sugar. Then remove the paper heart.

Fry both slices until golden brown on both sides.
Cut paper heart out of baking paper.
Place paper heart on one slice of bread and cut a heart shaped hole into the bread using the paper as a guide.
Spread jam on the other slice of bread, then place the bread with the heart on top of this slice.
Place the paper heart back over the hole, and sprinkle with icing sugar.
